system.description:
Time: 15−RSI minutes+Ritual: Prayer/Meditation
Range: Unlimited+Duration: One Summoning

Calls forth a specific denizen of the cleric’s deity. Invocation EML is reduced by Aura ×2 of the summoned ethereal; the more powerful the denizen, the more difficult it will be to summon. If the ethereal has already been perceived by the Revelation invocation, Summon EML is +10.

A summoned denizen will appear immediately with CS, or in 3d6 minutes with MS. It may be asked three questions with Divination, or banished with Command, etc.
